channel.title: Comments on: The Hasidic Tale Revisited
channel.description: notes on Jewish theology and spirituality

item.title: By: Jon Baker
item.dc:creator: Jon Baker
item.description: What relationship is there, if any, between third-party Rebbe stories, such as you review, and intentionally constructed Hasidic parables, like the "Tales of Reb Nachman" (1815) or more recently, pre-Hasidic pseudo-history like R' JI Schneerson's "Lubavitcher Rabbi's Memoirs"? The latter seems to fit into the mold of the stories discussed, more than the former.
